title: Chesapeake Crab Crackers Recipe
full_text:
Chesapeake Crab Crackers Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
15 mins
Marinating Time
60 mins
Total
65 mins
Serves
14 crackers
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
14
crackers,
such as
Ritz
4
ounces
jumbo lump crab meat
, picked over
1
teaspoon
Dijon mustard
1
teaspoon
Worcestershire sauce
1
teaspoon
fresh lemon juice
1/8
teaspoon
paprika
1/8
teaspoon
hot sauce,
such as
Frank's
1
medium stalk
celery
, minced
Salt
Pepper
Directions
Place crab in a medium bowl and lightly shred with a fork.
In a small bowl, whisk together mustard, Worcestershire, lemon juice, paprika, and hot sauce. Pour over crab.
Stir crab and dressing to combine. Mix in celery. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Let crab sit in refrigerator for one hour for flavors to blend.
Top each cracker with one tablespoon crab salad.
